title: 4 Pack Illuminated Light Switch, Lightswitch with LED Night Light, Automatic On/Off Sensor, Single Pole Switch, 15Amp 120/277Volt,White

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #15,707 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #60 in Electrical Light Switches       #60 in Electrical Light Switches

shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: Not Only A Light Switch: This night light switch legantly blends the features of a wall switch and nightlight together, frees up outlets, and no more worry about the night light would be carried off and lost by the toddlers, you can sleep easy now

SMART ILLUMINATION: Built in dusk to dawn sensor, automatically turns on only when ambient lighting becomes insufficient and load is OFF. Perfect for hallway, kitchen, bathroom, bedroom, home theater, pantry, nursery, and anywhere you need a nightlight.

EASY INSTALLATION: The lighted light switch does not require a neutral, it is easy to replace your kids night lights or the standard switches in nursery with the included wiring instructions. The special pilot light switch can add a contemporary look to a room

STANDARD SWITCH: Single pole electrical wall light switch, rating 15Amp 120/277Volt. Back insert and side terminal wiring, grounding screw. Compatible with LED,Incandescent,CFL, Halogen and Fluorescent lighting. Use with standard wall plate(sold separately)

HIGH QUALITY: Durable construction made of high-quality, impact resistant polycarbonate thermoplastic and solid steel. Gorgeously designed with a modern minimalist look, and the sturdy construction for long service life.

customers_say: Customers find the illuminated light switches practical and easy to install, appreciating how they add class to their homes. The brightness receives mixed feedback - while some say the output is strong enough, others find it not very bright. Moreover, the quality and value for money get mixed reviews, with some reporting units breaking within six months and considering them a waste of money. Additionally, the cover plates are not included, which customers find disappointing.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_snippet: Upgrade to existing laundry room light switches.  Appear to be good quality fixtures with a handy LED nightlight that comes in handy when entering either end of a dark room and looking for the light switch

customer_reviews.customer_name: My glasses came today as this is the second time I’ve bought one other before and this time around the glasses case wasn’t in the box

customer_reviews.review_snippet: Good quality wall switches with LED nightlight that makes it easier to find the switch in the dark UL listed so you can count on these being safe switches. Always ground your switches and outlets for extra safety.
